QuestData.Title: Waterlogged Recipe
QuestData.Description: This appears to be the remains of a mixture for potent wine. Perhaps the proprietor of One More Glass in Dalaran would be interested in it....
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Waterlogged Recipe to Christi Stockton in the Dalaran city.
QuestData.CompletionText: Wine is only as fine as the person drinking it, I always say.
QuestData.RewardText: This is quite a find, <name>. I can't have you selling this to anyone else, so I'm willing to offer generously.
